original_text: The great God who rules over Israel always does what he says he will do. He does not change his mind. People may change their minds, but he does not!’
korean_text: 이스라엘의 지존자는 거짓이나 변개함이 없으시니 그는 사람이 아니시므로 결코 변개하지 않으심이니이다 하니

sentences.original_text: always does what he says he will do
sentences.korean_translation: 항상 자신이 하겠다고 말씀하신 것을 행하신다

sentences.original_text: He does not change his mind
